footer.merchantInfo: This order is processed by our online reseller & Merchant of Record, Polar, who also handles order-related inquiries and returns.

confirmation.failed: A problem occurred while processing your order
confirmation.waitingWebhooks: Please wait while we are listening for those webhooks.
confirmation.eligible: You're now eligible for the benefits of {productName}.
confirmation.tryAgain: Please try again or contact support.

common.troubleWithButton: If you're having trouble with the button above, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser.

orderConfirmation.subject: Thank you for your order!
orderConfirmation.preview: Thank you for your order of {description}!
orderConfirmation.heading: Thank you for your order!
orderConfirmation.processed: Your order of {description} is now processed.

subscriptionConfirmation.subject: Your subscription to {product} is now active
subscriptionConfirmation.preview: Thank you for your subscription to {product}!
subscriptionConfirmation.heading: Thank you for your subscription!
subscriptionConfirmation.active: Your subscription to {product} is now active.

subscriptionCycled.subject: Your subscription to {product} has been renewed
subscriptionCycled.preview: Your subscription to {product} has been renewed
subscriptionCycled.heading: Your subscription has been renewed
subscriptionCycled.renewed: Your subscription to {product} has been renewed.

subscriptionCancellation.subject: Your subscription to {product} has been canceled
subscriptionCancellation.preview: Your subscription to {product} has been canceled
subscriptionCancellation.heading: Your subscription has been canceled
subscriptionCancellation.sorryToSeeYouGo: We're sorry to see you go! Your subscription to {product} will remain active until {endDate}, after which it will be canceled.
subscriptionCancellation.changeYourMind: If you change your mind, you can renew your subscription anytime before the end date.
subscriptionCancellation.benefitsContinue: Meanwhile, you will continue to have access to the following benefits:

subscriptionPastDue.subject: Your {product} subscription payment is past due
subscriptionPastDue.preview: Your {product} subscription payment is past due
subscriptionPastDue.heading: Your subscription payment is past due
subscriptionPastDue.paymentFailed: We were unable to process your payment for your {product} subscription. Your subscription is now past due and access to benefits has been temporarily suspended.
subscriptionPastDue.updatePayment: To restore access to your subscription benefits, please update your payment method and complete the payment.

subscriptionRevoked.subject: Your subscription to {product} has now ended
subscriptionRevoked.preview: Your subscription to {product} has now ended
subscriptionRevoked.heading: Your subscription has now ended
subscriptionRevoked.thankYou: Thank you for being a subscriber of {product}.
subscriptionRevoked.welcomeBack: We hope to see you again in the future - you're always welcome back.

subscriptionUncanceled.subject: Your subscription to {product} is now uncanceled
subscriptionUncanceled.preview: Your subscription to {product} is now uncanceled
subscriptionUncanceled.heading: Your subscription is now uncanceled
subscriptionUncanceled.noLongerCanceled: Your subscription to {product} is no longer canceled.

subscriptionUpdated.subject: Your subscription has been updated to {product}
subscriptionUpdated.preview: Your subscription has been updated to {product}
subscriptionUpdated.heading: Your subscription has been updated
subscriptionUpdated.changedTo: Your subscription has been successfully changed to {product}.
subscriptionUpdated.immediateWithCharge: The changes take effect immediately. The pro-rated amount has been charged to your account as part of this update.
subscriptionUpdated.immediateNextCycle: The changes take effect immediately. The pro-rated amount will be reflected on your next billing cycle.
